title: If you could collect anything what would would it be? - Quora

response.answer_text: If money were no object, I would collect French bisque dolls from the 19th to early 20th century and French automatons. But the upkeep on these dolls and mechanical figures would be an expense of their own on top of the initial cost(!) So, I’m happy with my actual “low rent” current doll collecting range. I’ll just admire the fabulous French items from afar.
